attributes.action: Help more people to buy houses at cheaper prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment should help the general public to buy more affordable housing. Instead, rich and greedy landlords are making fortunes. Why doesn't the goverment, instead of paying them rent, give that person a house and assist with paying the mortgage. They should also put more pressure on high street banks to give more affordable mortgages even those that have a bad credit history.
